subject: problems with thinkpad 770Z
body:
Hallo,
it is not possible for me to install debian etch on my thinkpad 770Z the 
installer goes quickli to 33% by partition writing and stops there up to the 
computer shut down. How can I check where the problem is? It is a hardware 
problem is the architecture file for i386 wrong? Have had anybody similiar 
experiences and a solution.
Thanks
-- 
Debian 4.0


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-laptop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
